name: Scrappee
description:
Game made during 48-hours Slavic Game Jam 2019 (#SGJ2019).

Steer a drone by balancing its two engines, using controller's right and left joy respectively. Press 'A' when magnet is in close radius to grab a block, and press it once more to drop it. LT & RT are causing engines to stop, whereas RB & LB are reversing its flow. Your goal is to move blocks to the truck, stacking them as high as possible and avoiding collisions on your way there.

Developed by extremely well-humored team of three people, magically self-organized themselves on the event kickoff. Powered by Godot Engine.

Playing with audio on is strongly advised(or Michael will be even more sad than on the picture).
